main event: An unidentified object sighting was reported in Muehlheim, Germany on November 21, 1956.
interesting points: The observer described the object as a stationary orange colored light in the Great Bear constellation., The light resembled the planet Mars in both color and size., The observation lasted for approximately 10 seconds., The observer concluded it was not an aircraft., The evaluation of the sighting noted insufficient data for a conclusive analysis.
sighted object: an orange colored light in the Great Bear constellation
